instruction: Please explain the factors that have contributed to the outstanding performance of the China Green Bond Index in comparison to the overall fixed income index and sub-market indices in recent years.
output: The exceptional performance of the China Green Bond Index is attributed to several factors. Firstly, the Chinese government has been actively promoting eco-friendly projects and policies, which have created a conducive environment for green issuances. Secondly, investors' growing awareness and demand for sustainable investments have boosted the demand for green bonds. Thirdly, the quality and transparency of green bond issuances in China have improved significantly, which has attracted more investors to this market. Finally, the inclusion of green bonds in major indices has also driven up its demand and performance.
